name: Roguelike Gunner
description:
This is a project from an Udemy course by James Doyle, link below :

https://www.udemy.com/course/unityroguelike/?kw=learn+to+create+roguelike&src=sa...

Game Controls : 

WASD: move

Spacebar: dodge

MouseButton0: shoot

M: map

Tab: change weapon

BananaGun made by mat
